title: Olive and Cheese Swirl Bread Rolls
ingredients: ['500g white flour', '15g fresh yeast', '1 pinch sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 egg', '6 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons finely chopped blanched almonds', '150g Kalamata olives, pitted and finely chop', '1 bunch fresh parsley, finely chopped', '165g grated Gruyere cheese', '2 eggs, beaten for glaze']
